payment_gateways.name: VT-Link
payment_gateways.description: VT-Link facilitates a payment feature for your online store by redirecting the customer to Veritrans payment page through a link.

payment_gateways.name: VT-Web
payment_gateways.description: Payments will be made in the yard Veritrans, with design and layout provided by Veritrans.

payment_gateways.name: VT Direct
payment_gateways.description: Where the payment is made at the merchant's site; with ease of design and layout tailored to the merchant's requirement.

payment_gateways.name: Authorize.Net
payment_gateways.description: Authorize.net Payment gateway enables Internet merchants to accept online payments via credit card and e-check.

payment_gateways.name: PayUMoney
payment_gateways.description: PayUbiz focuses on enterprises and is used by large enterprises such as Snapdeal whereas PayUmoney is the consumer brand of PayU India and has a wallet solution for consumers and payment acceptance solution for SMB businesses.

payment_gateways.name: PayPal
payment_gateways.description: PayPal is the faster, safer way to send money, make an online payment, receive money or set up a merchant account.

payment_gateways.name: Stripe
payment_gateways.description: Stripe is a suite of APIs that powers commerce for businesses of all sizes.
payment_gateways.currencies: USD, AUD, CAD, GDP, EUR, INR
